downloadDescription: This document discusses how to get started implementing a full Demand Management solution with Microsoft Project Server 2013.
detailsSection: This document discusses how to get started implementing a full Demand Management solution with Microsoft Project Server 2013. It is designed for IT professionals, developers, Project Management Office (PMO) or PWA administrators, business analysts, and business users.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
